name: Pip and Pit
description:
Pip and Pit – it's pixel-art platformer about gamer Pip, who has mysteriously fallen in abandoned
basement, in which are happening very strange things. Together with Pip you will have the opportunity
to fight with many inhabitants of the basement and figure out what's happening there and who so
desperately asking for help.
Features:
- 30 adventure levels
- 3 bosses
- Many different enemies: zombies, skeletons, ghosts etc.
- Soundtrack by Kevin MacLeod
- A lot of hidden secrets in each level
- Epic final Boss
- Amazing end of the story
